task.title: Remove Typewriter From Case
task.shortdesc: You can remove your typewriter from its case using the case release mechanisms.

step.cmd: Place the typewriter case down on a level surface, with the thinner side of the case on the bottom.
Press the double safety lock to open the case.
Push the case release button towards the carriage return to release your typewriter from its case.
Lift the front side of your typewriter 2 to 3 inches. Pull your typewriter towards yourself until it is fully removed from the case.
